tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE genetic_sequences (
    sequence_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    sequence_data BYTES,
    organism_name STRING
)

CREATE TABLE sequences (
  sequence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sequence_name VARCHAR(255),
  sequence_data TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE genes (
  gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_name VARCHAR(255),
  chromosome VARCHAR(10),
  start_position INT,
  end_position INT,
  strand CHAR(1)
)

CREATE TABLE annotations (
  annotation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_id INT,
  annotation_data TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES genes(gene_id)
)

CREATE TABLE mutations (
  mutation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  gene_id INT,
  mutation_type VARCHAR(50),
  mutation_position INT,
  mutation_description TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES genes(gene_id)
)

CREATE TABLE Genes (
    gene_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_name VARCHAR(255),
    chromosome INT,
    location_start INT,
    location_end INT
);

CREATE TABLE Variants (
    variant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_id INT,
    variant_type VARCHAR(50),
    nucleotide_change VARCHAR(10),
    PRIMARY KEY (variant_id, gene_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES Genes(gene_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Sequences (
    sequence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    gene_id INT,
    sequence_data TEXT,
    is_processed BOOLEAN,
    FOREIGN KEY (gene_id) REFERENCES Genes(gene_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Annotations (
    annotation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    variant_id INT,
    annotation_text TEXT,
    annotation_author VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (variant_id) REFERENCES Variants(variant_id)
);
